Name: Sunyata Flower
Title: Sunyata Flower
Desc: "This vibrant color is the miracle of life's flowing springs."\n"Abide with me, sing and caper with me, and let us weave eternal joy"...

Talent.Name: Sunyata Flower
Talent.Desc: Select a card from your Support Zone and discard it. After that, randomly generate 2 Support Cards in your hand.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>During the Round, the next time you play a Support Card: </color>Spend 1 less Elemental Die.
